column2: officially the Municipality of Arayat (Kapampangan: Balen ning Arayat; Tagalog: Bayan ng Arayat)
column3: is a 1st class municipality in the province of Pampanga

column1: A large portion of Mount Arayat is located within this municipality.
Arayat is politically subdivided into 30 barangays.

column6: with a density of 990 inhabitants per square kilometre or 2
